posts.excerpt: 初始化系统第三方开启sudo spctl --master-disable 增加空白占位符defaults write com.apple.dock persistent-apps -array-add '{"tile-type"="spacer-tile";}'; Killall Dock 隐藏应用使用透明图标显示defaults write com.apple.dock showhidden -bool true; Killall Dock 恢复默认defaults delete com.apple.Dock showhidden; Killall Dock 安装xcode插件xcode-select --install
posts.text: 初始化系统第三方开启sudo spctl --master-disable 增加空白占位符defaults write com.apple.dock persistent-apps -array-add '{"tile-type"="spacer-tile";}'; Killall Dock 隐藏应用使用透明图标显示defaults write com.apple.dock showhidden -bool true; Killall Dock 恢复默认defaults delete com.apple.Dock showhidden; Killall Dock 安装xcode插件xcode-select --install Anaconda brew报错alias brew="env PATH=${PATH//$(pyenv root)\/shims:/} brew conda 虚拟环境conda create -n python2 python=2.7.13 git设置默认git config --global user.email ""git config --global user.name "" anaconda 包位置/usr/local/var/pyenv/versions/anaconda3-4.2.0/lib/python3.5/site-packages homebrew配置安装homebrew/usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" 安装oh-my-zshbrew install git wget zshsh -c“$（curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh）” 修改homebrew源export HOMEBREW_BOTTLE_DOMAIN=https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/homebrew-bottles 常用软件安装brew install autojump autoconf autocode automake curl xz tmux colormake zsh-autosuggestions zsh-syntax-highlighting 配置zshsource /usr/local/share/zsh-syntax-highlighting/zsh-syntax-highlighting.zshsource /usr/local/share/zsh-autosuggestions/zsh-autosuggestions.zsh 参数修改常用源修改123.apmrcregistry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org/ strict-ssl=false 12.npmrcregistry = https://registry.npm.taobao.org 路由器vpn配置123nvram set model=RT-AC68Unvram set HW_ver=170nvram commit vim spf13curl https://j.mp/spf13-vim3 -L > spf13-vim.sh && sh spf13-vim.sh added by Anaconda3 4.2.0 installerexport PATH="/Users/abovesky/anaconda/bin:$PATH" 关注项目: git clone git@github.com:mining/mining.git brew常用包123456brew cask install java launchrocketbrew install curl brew inxtall tree gcc cmake ctags cscopebrew install gobrew install node brew install ruby python peal #DB123456brew install mongodbbrew install mysqlbrew install redisbrew install sqlitebrew install rabbitmqbrew install jenkins #系统12345brew install nginxbrew install tomcatbrew install iperf3brew install vimsudo chown -Rwhoami/usr/local
